newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Bankers Trust Equity to raise A$50 mln.
newsitem.headline: Bankers Trust Equity to raise A$50 mln.

text.p: Bankers Trust Australian Equity Management Ltd said on Monday it would make a one-for-three renounceable rights issue to raise around A$50 million in new capital to increase funds available for new investment.
The issue price of 70 cents per share represents a 14 percent discount on the closing market sale price of 81 cents on June 19. Its shares were at 82 cents ahead of the close on Monday.
BTA said it would offer a total of up to 72.7 million fully paid ordinary shares. The issue closes on August 11.
